trans-unit.source: Specifies the apartment state of a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o estado de apartment de um <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" />.

trans-unit.source: An apartment is a logical container within a process for objects sharing the same thread access requirements.
trans-unit.target: Um compartimento é um contêiner lógico em um processo para objetos que compartilham os mesmos requisitos de acesso de thread.

trans-unit.source: All objects in the same apartment can receive calls from any thread in the apartment.
trans-unit.target: Todos os objetos no mesmo compartimento podem receber chamadas de qualquer thread no apartment.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not use apartments, and managed objects are responsible for using all shared resources in a thread-safe manner themselves.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework não usa apartments e objetos gerenciados são responsáveis por usando todos os recursos compartilhados de maneira thread-safe próprios.

trans-unit.source: Because COM classes use apartments, the common language runtime needs to create and initialize an apartment when calling a COM object in a COM interop situation.
trans-unit.target: Como classes COM usam apartments, o common language runtime precisa para criar e inicializar um apartment ao chamar um objeto COM em uma situação de interoperabilidade COM.

trans-unit.source: A managed thread can create and enter a single-threaded apartment (STA) that allows only one thread, or a multithreaded apartment (MTA) that contains one or more threads.
trans-unit.target: Um thread gerenciado pode criar e inserir um single-threaded apartment (STA) que permite que apenas um thread ou um multi-threaded apartment (MTA) que contém um ou mais threads.

trans-unit.source: You can control the type of apartment created by setting the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState%2A> property of the thread to one of the values of the <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Você pode controlar o tipo de apartment criado definindo o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState%2A> o thread de um dos valores de propriedade a <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Because a given thread can only initialize a COM apartment once, you cannot change the apartment type after the first call to the unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: Como um determinado thread somente pode inicializar um compartimento COM uma vez, você não pode alterar o tipo de apartment após a primeira chamada para o código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Threading.Thread>, [Managed and Unmanaged Threading](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db425c20-4b2f-4433-bf96-76071c7881e5), and [Advanced COM Interoperability](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3ada36e5-2390-4d70-b490-6ad8de92f2fb).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Threading.Thread>, [gerenciado e não gerenciado de Threading](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db425c20-4b2f-4433-bf96-76071c7881e5), e [Advanced COM Interoperability](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3ada36e5-2390-4d70-b490-6ad8de92f2fb).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the apartment state of a thread.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como definir o estado de apartment de thread.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> will create and enter a multithreaded apartment.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> vai criar e inserir um Multi-Threaded Apartment.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> will create and enter a single-threaded apartment.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> vai criar e inserir um Single-Threaded Apartment.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState" /> property has not been set.
